name: part_003
file: tmp_【#holoIDChromaticFuture 】Free Partial - hololive Indonesia 5th Anniversary LIVE Chromatic Future [ScI02LHlT-w]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: MC segment where Kobo, Kaela, and Zeta talk about their excitement and explain the meaning of 'Chromatic Future'.
MC segment discussing social media posts and the concert hashtag.
The members share their feelings about the 5th-anniversary concert and thank the sponsors.
Showcasing their new 3D models and having fun with the camera.

subtitles.original: Kasi semangatnya!
subtitles.english: Give us some energy!

subtitles.original: Iya nggak sih? Iya nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Right? Don't you think so?

subtitles.original: Sikat!
subtitles.english: Let's go!

subtitles.original: Parah sih ini ada adrenalin rush kan ya?
subtitles.english: This is insane, there's an adrenaline rush, right?

subtitles.original: Pengen lari aku rasanya nih!
subtitles.english: I feel like running!

subtitles.original: Woi woi woi... mau kemana?
subtitles.english: Hey hey hey... where are you going?

subtitles.original: Stop stop stop stop stop stop stop stop.
subtitles.english: Stop stop stop stop stop stop stop stop.

subtitles.original: Nanti keringetan lho, nanti keringetan.
subtitles.english: You'll get all sweaty later.

subtitles.original: Kak Kaela gimana?
subtitles.english: How about you, Kaela?

subtitles.original: Aduh, seru banget.
subtitles.english: Gosh, it's so much fun.

subtitles.original: Aku nggak nyangka sih sampai aku bisa ada di sini ya.
subtitles.english: I didn't expect to be able to be here.

subtitles.original: Tapi ini ngomong-ngomong konser-nya masih panjang banget.
subtitles.english: But by the way, this concert is still long.

subtitles.original: Jadi kalian tetap semangat ya sampai akhir!
subtitles.english: So stay energized until the end!

subtitles.original: Sampai akhir! Semangat semangat semangat!
subtitles.english: Until the end! Energy, energy, energy!

subtitles.original: Eh tapi ngomongin konser dari tadi,
subtitles.english: But since we've been talking about the concert,

subtitles.original: emang pada tahu judul konsernya apa?
subtitles.english: does everyone know the title of the concert?

subtitles.original: Judul konser kita kali ini adalah Chromatic Future!
subtitles.english: The title of our concert this time is Chromatic Future!

subtitles.original: Ada yang tahu nggak artinya apa? Ayo absen!
subtitles.english: Does anyone know what it means? Let's check!

subtitles.original: Nah ini, Kobo paling tahu.
subtitles.english: Well, Kobo knows best.

subtitles.original: Yang jelasin yang paling tinggi. Yuk, let's go!
subtitles.english: The tallest one should explain. Come on, let's go!

subtitles.original: Segitu ya... ya udahlah ya udah ya udah...
subtitles.english: Oh, that's how it is... okay then...

subtitles.original: Nih ya guys ya buat kalian yang belum tahu,
subtitles.english: Listen up, guys, for those who don't know yet,

subtitles.original: Chromatic Future itu artinya tuh masa depan yang berwarna-warni.
subtitles.english: Chromatic Future means a colorful future.

subtitles.original: Jadi karena Hololive Indonesia kan udah 5 tahun nih,
subtitles.english: So, since Hololive Indonesia has been around for 5 years,

subtitles.original: kita sama-sama dari hari pertama sampai sekarang.
subtitles.english: we've been together from day one until now.

subtitles.original: Nah, jadi tuh untuk ke depannya kita tuh juga harapannya tuh
subtitles.english: So for the future, our hope is that

subtitles.original: kita bisa nyiptain waktu dan memori yang berwarna-warni
subtitles.english: we can create colorful times and memories

subtitles.original: sama seluruh fans dari Hololive Indonesia.
subtitles.english: together with all the fans of Hololive Indonesia.

subtitles.original: Iya gitu! Betul Kaela Kovalskia! Betul betul betul!
subtitles.english: That's it! Correct, Kaela Kovalskia! Correct!

subtitles.original: Nah, kalian sekarang udah pada tahu kan
subtitles.english: Now, you all know already,

subtitles.original: karena tadi udah dijelasin sama Kaela.
subtitles.english: since Kaela just explained it.

subtitles.original: Kalau gitu konsernya kan udah mulai nih.
subtitles.english: In that case, the concert has already started.

subtitles.original: Kalian mau nge-post soal konser ini di medsos?
subtitles.english: Do you want to post about this concert on social media?

subtitles.original: Jangan lupa hashtag #holoIDChromaticFuture ya!
subtitles.english: Don't forget the hashtag #holoIDChromaticFuture!

subtitles.original: Karena kita pengen banget lihat kalian tuh...
subtitles.english: Because we really want to see you...

subtitles.original: Pengen lihat semangat kalian!
subtitles.english: We want to see your spirit!

subtitles.original: Iya, itu! Betul banget, iya nggak?
subtitles.english: Yes, that's it! Exactly, right?

subtitles.original: Jangan typo, jangan typo!
subtitles.english: No typos, no typos!

subtitles.original: Asik, share ke semua! Oke?
subtitles.english: Cool, share it with everyone! Okay?

subtitles.original: Tapi jujur deh kalian tuh pas dibilang
subtitles.english: But honestly, when you were told

subtitles.original: kita bakal konser lho di Indonesia,
subtitles.english: that we would have a concert in Indonesia,

subtitles.original: kalian pada kaget nggak sih?
subtitles.english: were you guys surprised?

subtitles.original: Halo? Didengerin?
subtitles.english: Hello? Are you listening?

subtitles.original: Betul! Aku setuju juga.
subtitles.english: Correct! I agree as well.

subtitles.original: Aku merasakan empati terhadap adik saya Zeta.
subtitles.english: I feel empathy for my sister Zeta.

subtitles.original: Empati... iya iya. Kalau Kaela gimana?
subtitles.english: Empathy... yes. How about you, Kaela?

subtitles.original: Aku juga waktu itu nggak nyangka banget kayak 'hah, beneran?'
subtitles.english: I also really didn't expect it, like 'huh, really?'

subtitles.original: 'Ini real nih?' gitu kan? Kayak 'loh, bisa gitu akhirnya?'
subtitles.english: 'Is this real?' right? Like 'how could this happen?'

subtitles.original: Mana udah bersembilan di Indonesia pula ya kan?
subtitles.english: And with all nine of us in Indonesia too, right?

subtitles.original: Keren banget! Keren banget!
subtitles.english: So cool! So cool!

subtitles.original: Ini kan konser pertama Hololive Indonesia yang bersembilan.
subtitles.english: This is the first Hololive Indonesia concert with nine members.

subtitles.original: Sebenarnya tuh nggak hanya ini tuh momen terbesar
subtitles.english: Actually, this is not just the biggest moment

subtitles.original: dan terpenting juga untuk fans Hololive Indonesia,
subtitles.english: and most important for Hololive Indonesia fans,

subtitles.original: tapi seluruh dunia juga pasti bakal nonton nggak sih?
subtitles.english: but the whole world will definitely be watching, right?

subtitles.original: Iya nggak? Jawab! Iya iya, makasih semuanya.
subtitles.english: Right? Answer! Yes, thank you everyone.

subtitles.original: Tapi tentu aja ini pencapaiannya nggak bakal cuma sampai di sini.
subtitles.english: But of course, this achievement won't just stop here.

subtitles.original: Jadi selanjutnya mungkin kita bisa apa ya...
subtitles.english: So next, maybe we can...

subtitles.original: Dominating the world! Gitu!
subtitles.english: Dominate the world! Like that!

subtitles.original: We're ready!
subtitles.english: We're ready!

subtitles.original: Ready ready! Betul banget Kaela, Zeta.
subtitles.english: Ready ready! Exactly, Kaela, Zeta.

subtitles.original: Selain dari dukungan fans in this opportunity,
subtitles.english: Aside from the support of fans in this opportunity,

subtitles.original: kita juga mau mengucapkan terima kasih
subtitles.english: we also want to say thank you

subtitles.original: untuk semua sponsor yang mendukung terjadinya konser ini.
subtitles.english: to all the sponsors who made this concert possible.

subtitles.original: Makasih semuanya! Thank you thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone! Thank you thank you!

subtitles.original: Eh tapi ngomong-ngomong di konser ini kayaknya ada yang beda.
subtitles.english: But by the way, there seems to be something different.

subtitles.original: Hmm, Ela kamu sadar nggak?
subtitles.english: Hmm, Ela, do you notice?

subtitles.original: Soalnya kamu paling peka nggak sih?
subtitles.english: Because you're the most sensitive, aren't you?

subtitles.original: Wait, iya sadarlah.
subtitles.english: Wait, of course I notice.

subtitles.original: Kalau Kobo mah nggak bakal sadar.
subtitles.english: Kobo wouldn't notice.

subtitles.original: Nih nih nih nih. Yang beda tuh kali ini tuh model kita!
subtitles.english: This is it. What's different is our models!

subtitles.original: Ini model baru nih!
subtitles.english: These are new models!

subtitles.original: Ooh! Iya iya lucu lucu! Gemas banget!
subtitles.english: Ooh! Yeah, so cute! So adorable!

subtitles.original: Lucu lucu lucu! Kameranya deketin ke aku!
subtitles.english: So cute! Bring the camera closer to me!

subtitles.original: Kamera deketin ke aku!
subtitles.english: Bring the camera closer to me!

subtitles.original: Kak imutan Kobo nih nih nih nih.
subtitles.english: Kobo is cuter, look look look.

subtitles.original: Oshiri...
subtitles.english: My butt...

subtitles.original: Kamera deketin Kobo lagi!
subtitles.english: Bring the camera close to Kobo again!

subtitles.original: Stop stop stop stop stop stop stop!
subtitles.english: Stop stop stop stop stop stop stop!

subtitles.original: Mulai mulai mulai! Semua kamera diambil!
subtitles.english: It's starting! She's hogging all the cameras!

subtitles.original: Oke oke oke, kalau gitu... aduh sampai kehabisan napas.
subtitles.english: Okay okay, in that case... gosh, I'm out of breath.

subtitles.original: Jangan rebutan di depan konser!
subtitles.english: Don't fight in front of the concert!

subtitles.original: Iya iya iya!
subtitles.english: Yes yes yes!
